translations: v．贬低，诋毁：减损或损害某人或某事的价值、声誉或重要性。
· His bad manners detracted from his otherwise good character.
他的不良举止损害了他原本良好的品质。

sentences.sentence: Other IM services detracted from the gaming experience by not having the right form factor.
sentences.translation: 另外一些即时通讯服务，因为没有正确的形式要素而在用户的游戏体验中，被贬低了他们的价值。

sentences.sentence: None of these created their high net worth, in fact they might have even detracted from it.
sentences.translation: 这些都不在他们的高净资产，事实上，他们甚至可能减损它。

sentences.sentence: All this, it is true, detracted nothing from the angelic charms of the young girl of the Luxembourg.
sentences.translation: 所有这一切，确也丝毫无损于卢森堡公园中那个年轻姑娘所具有的那种天仙似的魅力。
